Command.name: Dir
Command.Help: Returns a list of files in the specified directory

Option.name: path
Option.Help: Do a dir listing from a directory other than the current one.
If '*' do a dir listing of all directories on all fixed drives

Option.name: max
Option.Help: Continue to return listings up to the number specified. If zero,
return all listings. If not specified, return all.

Option.name: time
Option.Help: Time type to use in after/before/age and display

Option.name: age
Option.Help: Only display files that are at most 'hours' old

Option.name: after
Option.Help: Only display files with timestamps after the given date

Option.name: before
Option.Help: Only display files with timestamps before the given date
